20110119030607.000|20110119030609.000|CC1|SNUGGLED, PROMOTED AND          
20110119030609.000|20110119030610.000|CC1|IMPLEMENTED.

20110119030611.000|20110119030612.000|CC1|TO THAT SECOND OPINION FROM     
20110119030612.000|20110119030613.000|CC1|DR. FRIST?

20110119030625.000|20110119030626.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE HEALTH, AND IT HAS  
20110119030626.000|20110119030629.000|CC1|BEEN TO SAY THE LEAST A FAILURE.

20110119030647.000|20110119030649.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT HEART ATTACK, NEVER    
20110119030649.000|20110119030649.000|CC1|OPERATED ON REPUBLICAN OR

20110119030715.000|20110119030718.000|CC1|CONSULTED ON THIS BILL THAT WAS 
20110119030718.000|20110119030719.000|CC1|PASSED.

20110119030719.000|20110119030721.000|CC1|BRING 30 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN 
20110119030721.000|20110119030725.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE AND NEVER BE ASKED. 
20110119030725.000|20110119030726.000|CC1|WE HAD 80 AMENDMENTS.

20110119030730.000|20110119030735.000|CC1|IPAB, IT WASN'T VOTED ON.       
20110119030735.000|20110119030737.000|CC1|THAT WAS VERY FRUSTRATING FOR   
20110119030737.000|20110119030738.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110119030738.000|20110119030746.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSMAN KUCINICH THEY    
20110119030746.000|20110119030749.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT THE POLLING, A       
20110119030749.000|20110119030752.000|CC1|MAJORITY, SLIGHTLY OVER 50% WERE
20110119030752.000|20110119030753.000|CC1|OPPOSED TO THE DEMOCRATIC BILL, 
20110119030753.000|20110119030756.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH THERE WAS MUCH HIGHER  
20110119030756.000|20110119030757.000|CC1|SUPPORT FOR INDIVIDUAL          
20110119030757.000|20110119030758.000|CC1|COMPONENTS OF IT.

20110119030759.000|20110119030802.000|CC1|AS -- WITH A SLIGHT MAJORITY IN 
20110119030802.000|20110119030804.000|CC1|MOST POLLS IN OPPOSITION TO IT. 
20110119030804.000|20110119030811.000|CC1|NOW ONLY 26% IN AN AP POLL, ONLY
20110119030811.000|20110119030814.000|CC1|26% WANT REPEAL.                
20110119030814.000|20110119030815.000|CC1|WE SEE THE REPUBLICANS MOUNTING 
20110119030815.000|20110119030816.000|CC1|AN EFFORT THAT IS COUNTER TO    
20110119030816.000|20110119030818.000|CC1|WHAT POLLS ARE SAYING.          
20110119030818.000|20110119030821.000|CC1|DO YOU HEAR REPUBLICANS CITING  
20110119030821.000|20110119030823.000|CC1|POLLS NOW THAT THEY'RE OPERATING
20110119030823.000|20110119030825.000|CC1|LEGISLATIVELY IN OPPOSITION TO  
20110119030825.000|20110119030826.000|CC1|WHAT THE POLLS SUPPORT?         
20110119030826.000|20110119030828.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU KNOW, FIRST OF ALL,

20110119033147.000|20110119033147.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110119033147.000|20110119033149.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110119033149.000|20110119033149.000|CC1|        People with COPD

20110119033155.000|20110119033157.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.
